name: Amateur Repairman
description:
Simon just wanted to watch the latest episode of his favorite isekai light novel adaptation: "I was reincarnated as a 14 year old's power fantasy, so now my life is really boring, but at least I'm surrounded by half-naked women who are all inexplicably in love with me!" or "Power Fantasy" for short, but then some eldritch god had to ruin his night. Help him on his adventure to repair his television. 

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020, Theme: Repair.
